tool_description: Finding a company's actual suppliers and customers is often very difficult. Many companies do not want to reveal this information to their competitors.  Leveraging hybrid data sources to deliver a complete picture of company supply chain ecosystems, this Corporate Supply Chain API enables investors to construct hedges and build statistical arbitrage strategies for a given corporate supply chain.
name: Corporate Supply Chain
title: Corporate Supply Chain

api_list.name: Supply Chain

required_parameters.name: ticker
required_parameters.description: Enter the stock symbol for the company
